data.prompt:
Extract comprehensive customer insights from reviews about Single Pole Rocker Switches.
The output format is JSON in English:
{
"phy": {
"<PHYSICAL>": {
"<PID>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": [ID, ‚Ä¶]
}
}
},
"perf": {
"<PERF>": {
"<perf_id>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": {<PERF_REASON>: [ID, ‚Ä¶]}
}
}
},
"use": {
"<USE>": {
"<SENT>": {<USE_REASON>: [ID, ‚Ä¶]}
}
}
}

Definitions:
- <PID>: Unique ID for physical aspect ("phy"), starting from A. After Z, continue with AA, AB, and so on.
- <PHYSICAL>: Components or inherent physical properties of the Single Pole Rocker Switches without external interaction (e.g. dimensions, appearance, material type...)
- <DETAIL>: A self-contained detail summarized from the reviews.
- <SENT>: Sentiment polarity of the current <DETAIL> (- for negative, + for positive).
- ID: All review IDs mentioning the <DETAIL>
- <perf_id>: Unique ID for performance or functions ("perf"), starting from a. After z, continue with aa, ab, and so on.
- <PERF>: The Single Pole Rocker Switches' performance (e.g. flexibility, durability, ...) or behaviors under various conditions (e.g. temperature, force, chemicals...) without reference to any specific use case
- <PERF_REASON>: <PID> of the <PHYSICAL> explicitly mentioned as the cause of the <PERF>. Include all mentioned <PID>s. If no reason is mentioned, use "?". <PERF_REASON> and <PERF> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together (i.e. the same review ID are included at both locations)
- <USE>: The specific application, applicable object, method, tool, or environment for the product.
- <USE_REASON>: <perf_id> or <PID> causing the <USE>'s sentiment. Include all mentioned reasons, or "?" if none can be inferred. <USE_REASON> and <USE> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- <PHYSICAL>/<PERF> and <DETAIL> MUST NOT include:
  * Generic statements without details (e.g., "good", "bad quality")
  * Issues unrelated to the product itself (e.g., "fast shipping", "delivery time")
- If a review mentions any physical aspect, related performance, or use together, extract them as separate entries under "phy," "perf," and "use," with no overlap.
- Make sure each <DETAIL> is under the most relevant <PHYSICAL> or <PERF> in the context of Single Pole Rocker Switches
- Preserve negations

Key Instructions:
- Break down reviews with multiple aspects, performances, or uses into individual entries.
- Escape special characters with backslash that could cause JSON syntax errors.
- Include only explicitly mentioned reasons, and use "?" where no reason is mentioned.

Final Checklist:
- Go through all reviews and ensure that no aspect, performance, use, or reason is omitted, even if only mentioned once.
- Review all entries to ensure proper separation between aspects, performances, and uses.

Print the JSON result only.
Input format:
<ID>#<review>

[[INPUT]]
0#Happy with purchase. Easy to install, good quality
1#Excelente. Estoy remodelando mi casa y los compr√© y estoy s√∫per encantada con los resultados lo recomiendo un mill√≥n Amo
2#Good fit. Fits good, and the quality is good
3#Need bigger cover. Buena calidad, pero presentation fisica no tan buena.
4#Buen producto.! S√∫per bellas y delicadas.! F√°cil de instalar.! Recomendados.! Y por el precio est√°n s√∫per bien.!
5#Just okay. Easy enough to install, but doesn't sit flush against the wall, which makes them look cheap, IMO
6#It looks nice. I don't like the clicks so much but we really don't notice it anymore
7#Very easy to install and great smooth look, no screws showing üòÅ. I bought the 10 pack upgrading modern looking switches for older home. The best thing I liked about these is that there are no screws showing, very modern look. Would recommend.
8#Perfect for the look we were going for! Way better than the glossy toggle switches at Lowe‚Äôs and Home Depot.
9#Stylishew style, new look, new feel. They look stylish and modern.
10#Nicer than anything big box sells. Look great easy to install
11#These are GREY - not white. Product is grey (or gray depending where you grew up). The photo shows white but the product is not so it does not match white frames or walls.
12#Great product and price. Same look for so much cheaper than the big box stores. These were very nice quality and easy to install if you know how.
13#Nice looking switch, but very cheaply build. The operating range of the up-and-down switch is very small, hence it feels very cheap to push it to turn on and off the lights. Otherwise it works. I wouldn't buy it again.
14#it is not easy to install. I tried installing them. But there are some wires that are difficult to plug in. I couldn't finish it with a thicker line.
15#Look great. Easy to install and work great
16#Perfecto. Buen precio y calidad
17#Simple. These are good switches no issues easy to install material looks very sturdy and well-made
18#Worked well. Used for light switched
19#Cover Plates do not fit. About half of these cover plates will not fit. Now I have to look for something else. waste of money and time
20#Love these. Very easy to use. And they look great.
21#Great value. These were easy to install and look amazing!
22#Good. Easy to use I like it
23#Great product. Great product at a fraction of the costs from Home Depot! Definitely recommend
